9 template <class T>
10 void nimbus::cloudEdit<T>::remover(const PointCloudConstPtr blob,
11  int width, int height, float perW, float perH,
12  PointCloud &res){
13  int hLower = (height*perH)/2;
14  int hUpper = (height - hLower);
15  int wLower = (width*perW)/2;
16  int wUpper = width - wLower;
17  int pCounter = 0;
18  //res.width = width-wLower-wUpper;
19  //res.height = height-hLower-hUpper;
20  for(int i = 0; i < height; i++){
21  std::vector<float> tempX;
22  std::vector<float> tempY;
23  std::vector<float> tempZ;
24  std::vector<float> tempA;
25  for(int j = 0; j < width; j++){
26  if((i > hLower & i < hUpper) & (j > wLower & j < wUpper)){
27  tempX.push_back(blob->points[pCounter].x);
28  tempY.push_back(blob->points[pCounter].y);
29  tempZ.push_back(blob->points[pCounter].z);
30  tempA.push_back(blob->points[pCounter].intensity);
31  pCounter ++;
32  }else pCounter ++;
33  }
34  if((i > hLower & i < hUpper)){
35  for(int i = 0; i < tempX.size(); i++){
36  T temP;
37  temP.x = tempX[i];
38  temP.y = tempY[i];
39  temP.z = tempZ[i];
40  temP.intensity = tempA[i];
41  res.points.push_back(temP);
42  }
43  }
44  }
45  res.width = res.points.size();
46  res.height = 1;
47 }
48 
49 template <class T>
50 void nimbus::cloudEdit<T>::zRemover(const PointCloudConstPtr blob,
51  float maxDis, float minDis,
52  PointCloud &res){
53  if(blob->points.empty())
54  return;
55  pcl::PointXYZI tempPoints;
56  for(int i = 0; i < blob->points.size(); i++){
57  if(maxDis > blob->points[i].z > minDis){
58  tempPoints.x = blob->points[i].x;
59  tempPoints.y = blob->points[i].y;
60  tempPoints.z = blob->points[i].z;
61  tempPoints.intensity = blob->points[i].intensity;
62  res.points.push_back(tempPoints);
63  }
64  }
65  res.width = res.points.size();
66  res.height = 1;
67 }
68 
69 template <class T>
70 double nimbus::cloudEdit<T>::computeCloudResolution(const PointCloudConstPtr cloud){
71  double res = 0.0;
72  int _points = 0;
73  int nres;
74  std::vector<int> indices(2);
75  std::vector<float> sqr_distance(10);
76  pcl::search::KdTree<T> tree;
77  tree.setInputCloud(cloud);
78 
79  for(std::size_t i = 0; i < cloud->points.size(); ++i){
80  if(! std::isfinite(cloud->points[i].x)){
81  continue;
82  }
83  // Search for 10 neighbors and take the max square distance
84  nres = tree.nearestKSearch(i, 10, indices, sqr_distance);
85  if(nres == 2 && sqr_distance[9] > 0.0001){
86  res += sqrt(sqr_distance[9]);
87  ++_points;
88  }
89  }
90  if(_points != 0){
91  res /= _points;
92  }
93  return res;
94 }

96 template <class T>
97 void nimbus::cloudEdit<T>::_toRangeImage(const PointCloudConstPtr cloud, pcl::RangeImage &temp_range_image)
98 {
99  float noise_level = 0.0;
100  float min_range = 0.0f;
101  int boder_size = 1;
102  float angular_resolution = pcl::deg2rad(1.0);
103  float max_angle_width = pcl::deg2rad(66.0);
104  float max_angle_height = pcl::deg2rad(54.0);
105  Eigen::Affine3f sensorPose = (Eigen::Affine3f)Eigen::Translation3f(cloud->sensor_origin_[0],
106  cloud->sensor_origin_[1],
107  cloud->sensor_origin_[2]);
108  pcl::RangeImage::CoordinateFrame coordinateFrame = pcl::RangeImage::CAMERA_FRAME;
109 
110  temp_range_image.createFromPointCloud(*cloud, angular_resolution, max_angle_width,
111  max_angle_height, sensorPose, coordinateFrame,
112  noise_level, min_range, boder_size);
113  temp_range_image.setUnseenToMaxRange();
114 
115 }
